articles.title: Physicists uncover hidden “doorways” that let electrons escape
articles.description: Scientists at TU Wien found that electrons need specific “doorway states” to escape solids, not just energy. The insight explains long-standing anomalies in experiments and unlocks new ways to engineer layered materials.
